attributes.action: Do not ban catapults or slingshots
attributes.background: We would like the Government to commit to not banning catapults and slingshots. Instead laws on harming wildlife could be strengthened. Catapulting is a hobby for many people and we don’t want to be punished for using them.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
